body:
Alter Database LEOTEXTILE Set Trustworthy On
Go

Drop Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_CreateJob;
Go

Drop Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_Schedule;
Go

Drop Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_Schedule_ForMachine
Go

Drop Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_Schedule_ForMachineGrupID
Go

Drop Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_CreateJobFabric
Go

Drop Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_CalculateManualScheduleResults
go

Drop Assembly TAPSManager;
Go

Create Assembly TAPSManager
From 'D:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL14.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\GuncelYazilim\TAPSManager.dll'
With Permission_Set = Unsafe;
Go

Create Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_CreateJob
As
External Name TAPSManager.YarnDye.CreateJob;
Go

Create Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_Schedule
    @type NVarchar(500)
As
External Name TAPSManager.YarnDye.Schedule
Go

Create Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_Schedule_ForMachine (@pMakinaID int, @type NVarchar(500))
As
External Name TAPSManager.YarnDye.ScheduleForMachine;
Go

Create Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_Schedule_ForMachineGrupID (@pMakinaGrupID Int,  @type NVarchar(500))
As
External Name TAPSManager.YarnDye.ScheduleForMachineGrupID;
Go

Create Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_CreateJobFabric
As
External Name TAPSManager.YarnDye.CreateJobFabric;
Go

Create Procedure dbo.SP55_TAPSManager_YarnDye_CalculateManualScheduleResults
    @type NVarchar(500)
As
External Name TAPSManager.YarnDye.CalculateManualScheduleResults
Go
